content: {"name": "SCCM - Norwood Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Walk-ins are welcome. No appointment is required to receive food assistance.\n\nIf you have questions, please call our office at 704.982.7915", "email": "", "url": "https://www.sccminc.org/food-pantries", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "247 West Turner Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Norwood", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28128", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.220072, "longitude": -80.12056919999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 982-7915", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}]}
